channel.title: Port forward?
channel.description: when i port forward? i have to run no-ip and the black box for the server? right? but can i put my computer on hibernate and the server will still run? like when i close my laptop the laptop go into sleep and after 2 hours it hibernates! is it possible to still run server if im hibernating? or do i have to have my computer open and on?

item.title: Port forward?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:5, topic:317326”]hey guys thx
but i didnt like the answer
so i have to have my computer on foreva to run the server until i buy a vps?[/quote]
yeah pretty much

Read full topic

item.title: Port forward?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:3, topic:317326”][quote author=Owner_Of_GdogScape link=topic=413865.msg3047394#msg3047394 date=1259859228]
Log on, run No-Ip…Run your server, No the server will not run when your computer is in hibernate or sleep.
If your portforwarding with Utorrent (Not recommended.) Exit Utorrent, run your server then start Utorrent again.
[/quote]

that wasnt his question, also, u can just open utorrent then run…[/quote]
And no your wrong, Sometimes the server will not run when Utorrent is open. It will say “Server Already In Use”. Because Utorrent is running on that port. So in that case you must close Utorrent run your server then open Utorrent. Yes I did answer his question, He said.

[quote=“kneistol, post:1, topic:317326”]but can i put my computer on hibernate and the server will still run?
like when i close my laptop the laptop go into sleep and after 2 hours it hibernates!
is it possible to still run server if im hibernating? or do i have to have my computer open and on?[/quote]

Read full topic

that wasnt his question, also, u can just open utorrent then run…

item.title: Port forward?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

Log on, run No-Ip…Run your server, No the server will not run when your computer is in hibernate or sleep.
If your portforwarding with Utorrent (Not recommended.) Exit Utorrent, run your server then start Utorrent again.

Read full topic
